title: Bain Capital to Seek $2.3 Billion in Coherent Block
description: Bain Capital offered an unregistered block of Coherent Corp. shares for as much as $2.3 billion, according to people familiar with the matter, the latest selldown of the private equity firm’s stake in the laser equipment maker.
content: Bain Capital offered an unregistered block of Coherent Corp. shares for as much as $2.3 billion, according to people familiar with the matter, the latest selldown of the private equity firm’s stake in the laser equipment maker.
